group.3.name: Social widgets
group.3.description: Block social media elements such as Like and Share buttons

group.4.name: Annoyances
group.4.description: Block annoying web elements, such as cookie notices or in-page popups

group.5.name: Security
group.5.description: Block requests to phishing and malicious websites

group.6.name: Other
group.6.description: This group contains various filters that don't fit into other categories

group.7.name: Language-specific
group.7.description: Block ads on websites in specified languages
